videos.title: How to make passwords more secure
videos.description: Learn more about threat management and passwordless security.

videos.title: Cyber Safety Tips to be Secured
videos.description: Practical tips on how to secure your home network and devices, covering everything from passwords to malware scans.

videos.title: Don't Destroy Your Children's Life !!!
videos.description: A powerful short film that shows the dangers of sharing photos and personal information online, highlighting the risks of identity theft and bullying.

videos.title: Are You Living an Insta Lie? Social Media Vs. Reality
videos.description: A powerful video that highlights the difference between curated social media lives and real life.

videos.title: Staring At A Screen All Day, Will Damage Your Brain ?
videos.description: An animated video that explains the effects of excessive screen time on your brain and body, including computer vision syndrome, vision problems, and sleep disruption.

videos.title: Understanding Deepfakes
videos.description: What are deepfakes and how are they created?

videos.title: AI won't kill us all â€” but that doesn't make it trustworthy.
videos.description: A talk that discusses the real dangers of AI, such as environmental costs, copyright issues, and bias, and how they impact society.

videos.title: The Good side of Deepfakes
videos.description: A video that explores the positive uses of deepfake technology, including democratizing human digitization, improving visual effects, and bridging language barriers.

videos.title: Targeted Ads: How Your Data is Sold !!!
videos.description: An educational video that explains how companies like Facebook use your personal data, from your profile information to your location and social interactions, to create targeted advertisements.

videos.title: Understanding Data Collection
videos.description: How companies collect and use your personal data
